Plugin.Name: Clipboard filter plugin
Plugin.Description: This is a plugin that filters the clipboard text, for example extracting code comments, removeing comments, applying regex filter.

Method.Name: ExtractCommentsOnly
Method.Description: Extracts block comments /* ... */ and line comments // from source code

Method.Name: RemoveComments
Method.Description: Removes block comments /* ... */ and line comments // from source code

Method.Name: RemoveEmptyLines
Method.Description: Removes empty lines from clipboard text

Method.Name: RemovePrintln
Method.Description: Removes any lines which start with a System.out.print call
